job_description:
• US citizen or green card holder: This internship requires access to documentation that is controlled by the export laws of the United States.
• Candidates are required to provide proof of either US citizenship, Permanent US residency, or classification as a protected individual as defined in 8USC 1324b(a)(3).
• Coursework & Knowledge: Completed coursework in financial management, accounting, statistics, microeconomics, or data analytics Practical Experience: Develop proficiency in project management methodologies by working on real-world challenges Collaboration Skills: Demonstrates excellent collaboration and communication abilities to work with diverse teams Education: Currently pursuing a degree in Project Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
• Learn Tools: Obtain hands-on knowledge of tools and methods used in HiRel Operations Development Projects Project Management Expertise: Familiar with project management concepts and PMO functions Contribute to Success: Apply skills and insights to drive progress in ongoing projects Support SPM Team: Collaborate with the HiRel Operations Project Management (SPM) team under the guidance of a senior Operations Project Manager (PJM).
